location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to George Skipp, at Schyrass [Shiraz]

mods.abstract: The letter is cover for copies of paragraphs from Captains Elphinstone and Nilson and a request that duplicates of his own letters be made in Shiraz as they don't have time to make them in Bushire.
